name: 1 Bit Galaga
description:
I do realize this is really much more like space invaders than Galaga... but oh well.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Shoot - Space

Menus - Point and Click

I wanted to mess around with 1 bit and see what I could come up with. I'm really happy with how most of the letters came out, I'll use that font style again for sure.

The actual game play is quite simplistic, I mean there is literally only one wave! So, I might return to this in the future and spice up the gameplay a bit. Who knows?
